title: zengogor
author: zengogor
created_time: January 18, 2023, 05:03:36 AMLast edit: January 18, 2023, 08:55:28 AM by zengogor
content: Good afternoon!https://tronscan.org/#/transaction/d901414fa27ee4dc93db67bf393a4ac054adf1be736b3476eb9ac2d2ff164e58https://tronscan.org/#/address/TNmWGD3Da7mckLupYpsTqu291eiS4pgxaA/transfers52 days, you have not credited 1,471.66 usdt to my balanceActive account number (USDT)511226891The money was debited from the address of the wallet to which this amount was received, if the money cannot be credited to the account, I ask you to return it to me.As I see it, you managed to use this amount and transfer them to another account without crediting them to my game balance.

comments.author: Apocollapse
comments.body: @OP you need to revise your subject, at first I think 1xbit is pay your winnings, but when I read the post 1xbit actually is scam you. You can change to "1xbit scam me for 1,471.66 USDT" or "1xbit not give my money for 1,471.66 USDT'Well the bad thing here is the 1xbit's representative in this forum is active because they have a signature campaign, but they're don't care with any complaint from their gamblers. Don't hope too much, you need to move on and choose the other reputable casino.

comments.author: slapper
comments.created_time: January 18, 2023, 05:20:39 AMLast edit: July 24, 2023, 05:49:31 AM by slapper
comments.body: It's a shame that 1xbit is giving you difficulties. They have a checkered past, and they take a lot of heat in this town for it. It's tough to tell if you'll actually get your money back. It's vital to do your homework before depositing any money at an online casino, as not all of them can be trusted. Be optimistic, yet ready for the worst

comments.author: zengogor
comments.body: I hope to get my money back.

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: Quote from: Apocollapse on January 18, 2023, 05:17:31 AM@OP you need to revise your subject, at first I think 1xbit is pay your winnings, but when I read the post 1xbit actually is scam you. You can change to "1xbit scam me for 1,471.66 USDT" or "1xbit not give my money for 1,471.66 USDT'Well the bad thing here is the 1xbit's representative in this forum is active because they have a signature campaign, but they're don't care with any complaint from their gamblers. Don't hope too much, you need to move on and choose the other reputable casino.I was about to castigate OP for the title that 1XBIT is returning his money because it's out of 1XBIT character for them to do that, but he is actually asking 1XBIT to return the money this scam casino owes him, another victim of 1XBIT, I don't he'll have a chance to get that money back and you are now part of a growing group of people that 1XBIT scammed it's better to move this in the scam section for reference and to populate 1XBIT scammed keywords reference on this forum.

comments.author: zengogor
comments.body: They started answering in support, I hope they solve this problem

comments.author: acroman08
comments.body: Quote from: zengogor on January 18, 2023, 05:53:26 AMThey started answering in support, I hope they solve this problemI suggest taking screenshots of your conversation with them. out of curiosity, what did they say? I mean, have they given a reason as to why this issue occurred? anyway, 1,471.66 is a sizable amount of money, I hope you get your money back, and to be honest they should give you compensation for the trouble they caused.

comments.author: zengogor
comments.body: https://ibb.co/7n99ZSKDear User,The funds have not been accepted by our payment system.Please contact your crypto wallet provider with this issue.https://ibb.co/ThXfq82Dear User,Once you click on the deposit page of the specified currency, there is a warning.The use of contract addresses is not allowed!Please do not use the contract addresses in the future transactions.All the information has been provided to you regarding the issue.Dear User,All the information has been provided to you in the email thread above.Further messages on the same issue will be ignored.After all this, I went to the wallet to which I sent the money, they were not there, that is, they used them without crediting them to my balance, Now I want to get this money back from them.

comments.author: zengogor
comments.body: https://tronscan.org/#/address/TNmWGD3Da7mckLUpYpsTqu291eiS4pgxaAthey received the money to this addresshttps://ibb.co/TqbwD7Nhttps://tronscan.org/#/transaction/d901414fa27ee4dc93db67bf393a4ac054adf1be736b3476eb9ac2d2ff164e58they said smart contract, not credited to the balance, ok, give me back this money.

comments.author: Cointxz
comments.body: Quote from: zengogor on January 18, 2023, 06:42:15 AMhttps://tronscan.org/#/address/TNmWGD3Da7mckLUpYpsTqu291eiS4pgxaAthey received the money to this addresshttps://tronscan.org/#/transaction/d901414fa27ee4dc93db67bf393a4ac054adf1be736b3476eb9ac2d2ff164e58they said smart contract, not credited to the balance, ok, give me back this money.There’s no meed to further explain your case because we believe in you. It’s just 1xbit is blatant scammer and the chance for your money to get back is very slim. Their customer support is obviously just giving reason to declined your request for your money to stuck in there. By simply checking their Tron address balance on the tronscan clearly they received the money. I’m just surprised now that they not even allowed you to play before they pull there scam scheme.Only local authorities can help you to recover your money. Bitcointalk forum can’t do any further besides the negative trust feedback they got on there profile here. Don’t waste time complaining because there’s a lot of unsolved cases about them. Sorry for your losses.

comments.author: zengogor
comments.body: I hope the 1xbit admin will read this and somehow be able to influence

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: zengogor on January 18, 2023, 06:33:31 AMAfter all this, I went to the wallet to which I sent the money, they were not there, that is, they used them without crediting them to my balance, Now I want to get this money back from them.I can easily believe your accusation given that 1XBIT has a bad reputation in the gambling industry, but we're not comfortable with the title of your thread that looks and read like that 1XBIT returned your money and you are trying to clean 1XBIT image, it's better to change the title to the words that easily understood by readers and its meaning.You should also transfer this to the scam section this is the second recommendation and follow the right format so you're accusation will appear legit, on your request that they give back your money, unfortunately, that's not going to happen, they are notorious on this, and you just got scammed.

comments.author: Wapfika
comments.body: Quote from: zengogor on January 18, 2023, 07:02:49 AMI hope the 1xbit admin will read this and somehow be able to influenceHere’s the trust page of 1xbit admin here. If you are still hoping that he will help you once he read your issue then you should start reading all the suggested comment from all the members sending those red feedback.You can click the image to redirect you on the 1xbit official Bitcointalk account trust page.

comments.author: rodskee
comments.body: like the top post ? edit your title cause it sounds like a shill post not after being read , it looks like you are vouching for them lol.But as you can see in the ANN thread of this site(in which you also put a post similar to this one) the site/team had not been answering every accusation towards them meaning that your fight is for nothing here but to let people Know how they works but not to take your money back.like those hundred of accounts that seek for their Money back  , the Odd of getting is close to impossible.sorry for your losses actually but nothing you can do but Move on.

comments.author: Outhue
comments.body: This is why members on this forum are trying to protects people like you OP, I never knew 1xbit until I saw many accounts getting red trust for promoting 1xbit and I began my own research which ends up showing how scam of a company 1xbit is....Before using any platform always make sure that people talk good about them on this forum, once they ruined their reputation we don't expect anyone to interact with them again. Ask questions before making a conclusion, I am sorry for your loss.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Just move on mate, as long as it has to do with 1xbit, be rest assured that your money is gone, this forum, though does not regulate scam, has in previous times warned every member of the gambling community to avoid playing on 1xbit, this is why all of the users that are promoting them by wearing their signature ad are all tagged with negative trust..you are not a newbie on this forum i guess, why in the first place did you choose to play on 1xbit when there are many other reputable and much more better casinos around ?Like i said, just move on and find a better casino to play on, 1xbit might never return your money.EDIT: I just saw that you signed up on this forum today, sorry for wrongly assuming you are not a newbie.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: Fivestar4everMVP on January 18, 2023, 07:50:19 AM....you are not a newbie on this forum i guess, why in the first place did you choose to play on 1xbit when there are many other reputable and much more better casinos around ?Like i said, just move on and find a better casino to play on, 1xbit might never return your money.He is a newbie in this forum bro, all his posts are on this topic OP is still hoping that he can get his money back but like all the others are saying its unlikely, there are amounts higher than yours and there are players whom they scammed that threatens to charge them in court, but they never got their money back.The best that you can do is to move on and forget all of this move and take this as a learning process for you but do not give up playing in casinos to enjoy, there are still a lot of good casinos in this community.

comments.author: Daltonik
comments.body: Quote from: zengogor on January 18, 2023, 05:03:36 AMGood afternoon!https://tronscan.org/#/transaction/d901414fa27ee4dc93db67bf393a4ac054adf1be736b3476eb9ac2d2ff164e58https://tronscan.org/#/address/TNmWGD3Da7mckLupYpsTqu291eiS4pgxaA/transfers52 days, you have not credited 1,471.66 usdt to my balanceActive account number (USDT)511226891The money was debited from the address of the wallet to which this amount was received, if the money cannot be credited to the account, I ask you to return it to me.As I see it, you managed to use this amount and transfer them to another account without crediting them to my game balance.I'm sorry about your loss of funds, but we can only say one thing that 1xbit is a well-known and proven scam for a long time, you just had to be more careful before making deposits there and playing roulette with them to withdraw something, now you just lost your money.

comments.author: MiliMil
comments.body: Quote from: zengogor on January 18, 2023, 05:21:17 AMI hope to get my money back.Unfortunately they won't pay you. They have an active presence on this forum and do not care about their reputation.There are literally dozens of scam accusations against them.I suggest you forget about it and move on.

comments.author: NicNacCoin
comments.body: Quote from: zengogor on January 18, 2023, 05:03:36 AMGood afternoon!https://tronscan.org/#/transaction/d901414fa27ee4dc93db67bf393a4ac054adf1be736b3476eb9ac2d2ff164e58https://tronscan.org/#/address/TNmWGD3Da7mckLupYpsTqu291eiS4pgxaA/transfers52 days, you have not credited 1,471.66 usdt to my balanceActive account number (USDT)511226891The money was debited from the address of the wallet to which this amount was received, if the money cannot be credited to the account, I ask you to return it to me.As I see it, you managed to use this amount and transfer them to another account without crediting them to my game balance.1xbit is a scam platform. It has made people aware since long ago. Why did you use this platform anyway? The campaign they are running on the forum is also inundated with scams. They don't pay people for their campaigns. They send their accounts there themselves and take their weekly dollars. Everyone is aware of this scam platform. No one should fall into the trap of deception. You can't do anything by complaining here. Big members have been revealing about the scam for a long time.
